title: Disappearing Support Tickets
body: Okay now I'm having a lot of trouble with the support tickets systems. I recently had an account of mine stolen and 3 times now I've submitted a support ticket and all 3 times my ticket has disappeared with now answer or closed ticket showing. I have no idea what's going on and i really need some help. It's gotten to the point a made a Twitter just to talk to the Riot Support feed. Just what's going on?

replies.body: Even though you can't login to see your ticket, correspondence can still be sent between us through the email you used for your submissions.  When our account team responds to your ticket, you will receive an email.  You'll be able to reply to it, which will allow us to continue communication.  We'll help you out!
So even though I submitted a ticket it may not show up in My Tickets section? And to reply all i do is just email in response to the confirmation email about my ticket submission?

Close!  A specialist will respond to your ticket which will come with an email notification.  You can reply to that email directly which acts just the same as your tickets section.  It's just another way of responding to the ticket.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Yeah that clears up a bit but I'm still just a bit concerned with not seeing my tickets and having no response in my email I just like to be updated on what's happening and how things are going.
